title: Use It. Share It. Bank It. You decide
text: The introduction of household-scale energy production such as Solar panels and storage  has transformed the composition of energy markets. With the introduction of so many independent actors in the market, it presents the opportunity to introduce real-time optimization for the networks itself. As decarbonization trends  continue, consumers will become more carbon-aware, as such our goal is to provide a solution that automatically optimizes energy flow usage..
